subject: docs(deploy): add decision comments to icon SVG and manifest config
body:
Add What/Why/Alternatives documentation per code standards:
- icon.svg: why generic serif instead of Georgia (CI compatibility)
- vite.config.ts: why maskable is a separate entry (Chrome warning)
